message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $170 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate you making an offer.  $120 is a bit too low for me right now.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?  I'm confident this product will be worth it to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I believe I can only afford to pay $125 for the product. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
